ixml.comment:
g012: a small ixml grammar: 012
One of a series (initially for test case construction).
This one is an FSA with 0 nonfinal states, 1 final state, 2 arcs. (I'm not counting the nil arc marking S as final.)
L is the set containing any string of XML characters other than blank or the C0 characters (tab, CR, LF).
